text: Lincoln is a city of Benton County in the state of Missouri, United States. 1,144 people lived there in the 2020 census. A post office called Lincoln was founded in 1866. The city was named after Abraham Lincoln, sixteenth President of the United States. == References == == Other websites == * City of Lincoln official website * Historic maps of Lincoln in the Sanborn Maps of Missouri Collection at the University of Missouri Category:Cities in Missouri Category:Settlements in Benton County, Missouri
title: Lincoln, Missouri
